short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to self audit your browsing history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tool for self-auditing your browser history to find unused tools.

For example imagine you have a list of vendors / subscriptions that you pay for. 

You can enter those websites into this extension, and it will search for all of them and show you which ones you use and how often you use them.
